attributes.action:
The Taking of a Life Act/The Murder Act.
This was all I could upload.
attributes.additional_details:
These are information taken from the Parliament website title "Knife Crime Statistics". 

Homicide
In 2017/18 there were 285 homicides currently recorded using a sharp instrument, including knives and broken bottles, accounting for 39% of all homicides – an increase from the 212 recorded in 2016/17.

Knife crime by police force area
London recorded the highest rate of 169 offences involving a knife per 100,000 population in 2018/19, an increase of 1 offence per 100,000 population from 2017/18.
attributes.background:
This proposed Act serves as a response to the escalations of murders in the capital. 
I Had to take all the substance out of this proposal to upload this, that NEED to change. We should not be limited on such an important issue.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
